text: Baranakubaza (yewe Muhamadi) ku byerekeranye n’imihango y’abagore? Vuga uti "ni umwanda". Bityo mujye mwitarura cy’imihango, abagore mu gihe ntimuzabegere (ntimuzakorane na bo imibonano) kugeza igihe imihango ihagarariye. Imihango nihagarara bakisukura, muzabonane na bo nkuko Allah yabategetse. Mu by’ukuri, Allah akunda abicuza akanakunda abisukura
